mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_trade (board_id, trade_price, trade_category) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{tradePrice}, #{tradeCategory});
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id as boardId, b.user_id as userId, b.board_type as boardType, b.title as title, b.content as content, b.report_count as reportCount, b.click_count as clickCount, b.local_si as localSi, b.local_gu as localGu, b.reg_date as regDate, b.`update` as `update`, t.board_trade_id as boardTradeId, t.trade_price as tradePrice, t.trade_category as tradeCategory FROM board AS b JOIN board_trade AS t ON b.board_id = t.board_id WHERE board_type = 2
